Thanks a lot eztv!! :D
Southpark + Facebook = AWESOME!

I cant believe that the lame cunt trying to trick people by adding [eztv] before the oh-so-easily spotted "Anonymous" actually appears to have higher rate of traffic than the real deal. 

COME ON PEOPLE, IGNORE THE STUPID PREFIX AND LOOK FOR THE ACTUAL USERNAME BEHIND THE UPLOAD!!!

Not to mention that you stupid/ignorant/complacent excuses for lifeforms even have the freaking skulls to look for as well. 

Pathetic, well thanks a million times to the person behind this bot, at least you are one of the good guys. Keep it up! :)

Seriously, that guy was a dick. Spammers are annoying, but you should also be a smart pirate! Check the username (as MarkStern pointed out). Always trust eztv, aXXo (I don't know if he still posts), TvTeam, ESPALPSP, and xsaimex. Also, if you click on the number of files above, you can see the filetype and filename. If it's a TV show, only download .avi or .wmv. If it's a ZIP or RAR file, good luck removing the trojans.

@clevelandsteemer: There is another South Park file in the Top 100 where he put [eztv] in the filename, but it was actually fake and posted by "Anonymous". We're not accusing eztv, we're pissed we almost (or did) download a fake about an hour ago. LONG LIVE EZTV!

Thanks heaps.

to those wondering: this is NOT THE GINGER-EPISODE

I've restarted this sentence about eight times because I'm finding words difficult, but this South Park is the best satire depicting the plainest truths I have encountered in a great while.  I have spent more time on the internet than I mortal man should, and for many and varied reasons I could never fully explain to my real life friends and family, I have refused utterly to make a Facebook account.  I have never felt so connected to a animated character as I was with Stan when his friends and family increasingly hounded him about facebook.
